Articles.Content:
Admirer of the game, but only have been playing the demo. I hope to own the full version soon enough, given all the incredible things I've seen other players building.

My biggest "accomplishment" so far has been getting a Kerbal into orbit around the sun. No idea how I did it, and I've tried in vain to save the little guy, but all seems lost for him.

Anyways, I look forward to more adventures, and even misadventures, in space.
